About Me
hello

My name is Vivek Kaushal, and I am a computer science undergrad at IIIT Hyderabad, India. I research on interesting topics in human computer interaction, risk and neuroeconomics, for more information on my work or to contact me, checkout my profile and blog at vivekkaushal.com.

Cheers!
